column3: News;Svay Rieng province: Preliminary news reports said that heavy rain from around 11am-1.30pm on October 17
column4: 2018 caused heavy flooding. The city and markets in Svay Rieng became deluged
column5: mainly due to garbage blocking the drainage system.------Look
column6: all the streets of the city are completely flooded!------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/720386.html
